# structured_agent

The `StructuredAgent` module for creating agents with structured responses.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/structured_agent/index" symbolName="AsyncStructuredStream" /> AsyncStructuredStream

An asynchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/structured_agent/index" symbolName="Response" /> Response

The response generated by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/structured_agent/index" symbolName="StructuredStream" /> StructuredStream

A synchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/structured_agent/index" symbolName="Dataclass" /> Dataclass

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/structured_agent/index" symbolName="BaseStructuredAgent" /> BaseStructuredAgent

Structured agent class for generating structured responses using LLMs with tools.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="agents/structured_agent/index" symbolName="StructuredAgent" /> StructuredAgent

Structured agent class for generating structured responses using LLMs with tools.
